Name: Bahia
Ingredients: 75 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge, Luxardo Maraschino Cherry & mint sprig.
BLEND all ingredients with 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: If you like Piña Coladas but are too embarrassed to order one then this drink is for you.
History: Bahia is one of the 26 states of Brazil. It is also a pre-Prohibition drink containing dry vermouth, sherry, absinthe and bitters. This more recent Piña Colada style offering has more mass market appeal.
Nutrition: One serving of Bahia contains 235 calories
